product_name: REI Wind Pro Vest - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Zip on the men's REI Wind Pro Vest when you need a little extra core warmth and protection while running, hiking or camping. Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) lightweight fleece offers higher wind resistance than traditional fleece without compromising breathability. Durable water repellent finish beads up light rain. Stretch velour back feels luxuriously soft. The REI Wind Pro Vest features zippered handwarmer pockets. Special buy.
short_description: Zip on the men's REI Wind Pro Vest when you need a little extra core warmth and protection while running, hiking or camping.
